Irreversible actions that will affect your data
This will remove all custom tabs and reset all settings to their default values. This action cannot be undone.

Where would you like to import this configuration?
Are you sure you want to reset to default tabs and settings? This will:

Enable cross-device sync?

Your tabs will be synced across all your computers using browser sync. This allows you to access your custom tabs on any device where you're signed in.

Note: Large configurations (>100KB) may not sync properly. Click OK to continue.
Context/Description: Shown when enabling sync (line breaks preserved with double newline)

English Text:
Disable cross-device sync?

Your tabs will only be stored on this computer. They will not sync to other devices.

Click OK to continue.

Disable profiles?

This will merge all tabs from all profiles into a single tab list. You can re-enable profiles later.

Click OK to continue.
All settings and tabs reset to defaults
New profile created with imported tabs
Sync enabled - tabs will now sync across devices
Sync disabled - tabs stored locally only
